title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4113.8 - First start
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4113.8 - First start

State Regulations

No horse shall start in any stake or early closing event
on which pari-mutuel wagering is conducted unless it shall have at least one
performance line satisfactory to the judges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4113.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
